dt: {bc}occurring in or being an interval or intervening space or segment {bc}of, relating to, or forming an {d_link|interstice|interstice}

dt.t: … the site has been running {wi}interstitial{/wi} ads, which consist of a full page of advertising between editorial pages, for a little more than a year.

dt: {bc}situated within but not restricted to or characteristic of a particular organ or tissue
{bc}affecting the interstitial tissues of an organ or part
{bc}being or relating to a crystalline compound in which usually small atoms or ions of a nonmetal occupy holes between the larger metal atoms or ions in the crystal lattice

shortdef: occurring in or being an interval or intervening space or segment : of, relating to, or forming an interstice
situated within but not restricted to or characteristic of a particular organ or tissue —used especially of fibrous tissue
affecting the interstitial tissues of an organ or part
